Course outline

What you will learn in the simulator

Wireframing
User feedback
User journey
User persona
Data-driven decisions
Testing
Moodboards
Design Process
ux fundamentals
Zeplin
Figma
Miro
Usertesting.com
Analytics
& many more
Education in a format of a gamified story

1. Introduction

What you will learn in chapter:

• Understanding user feedback
• Difference between UI and UX
• Factors that affect UX

2. Problem detecting

What you will learn in chapter:

• Common mistakes
• Product pivoting
• Steps in UX Process

3. Analyzing

What you will learn in chapter:

• Working with data
• User personas
• Gathering user feedback

4. Know your customer

What you will learn in chapter:

• Problem-solving mentality
• Data-driven solutions
• Customer journey map

5. Prototyping & testing

What you will learn in chapter:

• Creating low fidelity wireframes
• Testing wireframes
• Feedback-loop

6. Finalizing the project

What you will learn in chapter:

• Creating & testing UI
• User personas
• Future of UX

Simulator storyline

Chapter list

These are the chapters of the simulator. Each chapter will teach you essential UX design knowledge as well as related industry knowledge that will help you in your future work life
